    • Uses of GpioInterruptListener in com.pi4j.wiringpi

      Methods in com.pi4j.wiringpi with parameters of type GpioInterruptListener 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void GpioInterrupt.addListener​(GpioInterruptListener listener)
      Java consumer code can call this method to register itself as a listener for pin state changes.
      static boolean GpioInterrupt.hasListener​(GpioInterruptListener listener)
      Returns true if the listener is already registered for event callbacks.
      static void GpioInterrupt.removeListener​(GpioInterruptListener listener)
      Java consumer code can all this method to unregister itself as a listener for pin state changes.
